sql.if: WHERE title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.select:
SELECT B.board_no, B.title, B.content, B.writer, B.reg_date_time, B.view_count, COUNT(R.reply_no) AS reply_count FROM tbl_board B LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_reply R ON B.board_no = R.board_no
GROUP BY B.board_no ORDER BY B.board_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}
SELECT B.board_no, B.title, M.name AS writer, B.content, B.view_count, B.reg_date_time, M.account FROM tbl_board B LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member M ON B.account = M.account WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (writer, title, content, account) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{account});
